issue.title: app.prolific.co
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://app.prolific.co/account](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.prolific.co%2Faccount) ### Comment > I initially came across this error trying to re-login to Prolific extension. It would display a blank page. Knowing that has been the case recently with quite some pages, I paused AdGuard. Surely enough, the login page loaded. > I saw an (iframe?) inline popup asking for stupid cookies options (yes I believe these totally suck, always getting in the way distracting you from your goal). I suspect this could be the cause of nothing being displayed on the page with AdGuard ON. > > I believe this problem should be addressed on a wider level than just this particular page. Idiotic statutory Cookies options have caused the same effect on at least 2 other sites now (regretfully it didn't come to me to remember the sites URLs, but today I decided I had enough of this). > > Usually after answering the cookies query (and thus setting the cookie about the cookies so no further questions is directed to cookies window) the problem subsides. But in this case I was able to provide URL which even after answering the cookies query fails to display the page properly in the browser. > > I use MS Edge latest version. AdGuard extension is latest as well, and filters updates have been also downloaded. > > With kind regards > Maxim ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ho3s67qdep4os4w844gwo0kgccgkwoct0bmaf8abas.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/agj9fh3wxj40okk8oscckss0wowws0spyfvbzizrq8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.57 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,
EasyList Italy,
Frellwit's Swedish Filter Other extensions used: | No other ad blockers. Extensions: Microsoft Editor, MS Power Automate, OneNote WebClipper, Prolific Assistant, Spaywall

As additional help, I'm uploading F12 Dev Tools view of what goes wrong.
![Prolific F12 Console Adguard=OFF](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/133547408/2ac68229-8b98-4deb-b7bb-e417d7c5d728)

It looks like the page is still there, just is being covered by blank page which we see as "no visible page displayed".
